content: In R5, SD have changed the binding for Composition.attester.mode to preferred not require (I don't agree with this change - it should be at least Extensible). but shouldn't DocumentReference.attester.mode be the same?
In addition, I'm troubled by the replacement of Composition.relatesTo.code with RelatedArtifact in Composition, and this also overlaps, so I'm drawing OOs attention to this issue
The CR was filed against both, but the two are owned by different groups. Alignment would be good, especially for the elements dominantly there for discovery.
